explanation: [0-0] In front of a green background, a young man in a white T-shirt sits at a gray textured table. He holds an orange box in his hand and his mouth is slightly open. His other hand is open, palm up, and there is a pink mug on the table.

[0-3] The man shakes the box, and a white candy drops from the box into his hand. Then the candy falls into the pink mug. The man looks forward and into the mug in surprise. The man smiles and points his left index finger up and shakes it.
